positions.title: Senior Software Engineering Manager
positions.summary: Led development of enterprise collaboration platform serving millions of users

general: Managed engineering team of 12+ developers across multiple time zones
Delivered high-impact features for Microsoft Teams platform
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
finance: Delivered enterprise-grade solutions with strong focus on compliance and security
Managed multi-million dollar platform serving Fortune 500 financial institutions
Implemented SOX compliance measures and audit trail capabilities
tech: Architected microservices handling 100M+ API calls daily
Led adoption of cloud-native technologies and containerization

achievements: Led team that delivered Microsoft Teams Chat functionality
Reduced system latency by 45% through performance optimization
Mentored 5 engineers who were promoted to senior roles
